itinerary.mapNote: Arrival day. Lakeside town. Gear check. 827m.

itinerary.route: Drive to Klue; Trek to Ghandruk
itinerary.mapNote: Gurung village. Stunning Annapurna South face views. 1940m.
Gateway to the Sanctuary. Stone-paved village. 2170m.
Modi Khola gorge narrows. Bamboo forest. 2310m.
The Sanctuary gate. Open amphitheatre begins. 3230m.
The Sanctuary. Surrounded by 7 peaks over 6000m. 4130m.
Natural hot springs on Modi Khola. Trail reward. 1780m.

itinerary.route: Jhinu Danda to Bridge & Drive to Pokhara
itinerary.mapNote: Trail end. Drive to Pokhara lakeside. 827m.

waypoints.name: Annapurna Base Camp
waypoints.note: The Sanctuary. Ringed by 7 peaks over 6000m.

waypoints.name: Annapurna I Summit
waypoints.note: 10th highest peak. First 8000er climbed (1950). Deadliest by %.

waypoints.name: Machhapuchhre (Fishtail)
waypoints.note: Unmistakeable forked summit. Sacred — never been climbed.

waypoints.name: Chhomrong Village
waypoints.note: Gateway to Sanctuary. Last supplies and hot showers.

waypoints.name: Jhinu Hot Springs
waypoints.note: Natural thermal pool on Modi Khola. Trail reward on return.

waypoints.name: Gangapurna Lake
waypoints.note: Glacial lake near Manang. Day hike from ABC route via Manang.
